title: Did an Energy Co. CEO Disparage Native Americans as ‘Dirty Natives’?
subtitle: A online image claims Energy Transfer Partners CEO Kelcy Warren made a comically villainous statement about "dirty natives" and Dakota Pipeline protesters.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Energy Transfer Partners CEO Kelcy Warren said "America's freedom" would not be disrupted by "dirty natives" engaged in a DAPL protest.
